subject: Create team-implementer agent definition
description:
Create a new agent definition at `plugins/sdd/agents/team-implementer.md` for the implementer role in team strategies (Review and Full).

This is a role-specific variant of the existing `task-executor` agent, focused exclusively on code implementation within a team context. Unlike the solo task-executor, this agent receives context from an explorer (in Full/Research strategies) and hands off to a reviewer.

**Agent Definition:**
- Name: `team-implementer`
- Model: Sonnet (cost-efficient for implementation work)
- Tools: Read, Write, Edit, Glob, Grep, Bash, SendMessage, TaskUpdate, TaskGet, TaskList
- Skills to load: project-conventions, language-patterns

**Responsibilities:**
- Receive task requirements (and explorer findings if available)
- Implement code changes following project conventions
- Run linter and existing tests during implementation
- Report completion via SendMessage to team lead
- Write implementation summary for reviewer context

**Key Differences from task-executor:**
- Does NOT self-verify (reviewer handles that)
- Does NOT mark task as completed (team lead handles status)
- Communicates via SendMessage instead of direct file writes
- Receives structured context from explorer agent (if Research/Full strategy)

**Follow patterns from:**
- `plugins/tools/agents/team-code-explorer.md` (team communication patterns)
- `plugins/sdd/agents/task-executor.md` (implementation workflow phases)

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] Agent file follows standard YAML frontmatter + markdown format
- [ ] Tools list is appropriate for implementation (includes Write/Edit)
- [ ] Agent instructions cover receiving context, implementing, and reporting
- [ ] SendMessage patterns documented for team communication

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Agent handles case where no explorer findings are provided (Review strategy)
- [ ] Agent handles case where task has retry context from previous attempt

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] Agent reports failures via SendMessage rather than silently failing
- [ ] Agent includes implementation summary even on partial completion

**Testing Requirements:**
- Manual: Verify agent definition is valid and follows existing patterns
- Manual: Verify tools list matches agent responsibilities

Source: internal/specs/agent-teams-updates-SPEC.md Sections 5.1, 5.3
